Title: The Lesson of the Iron Bough
Description: First, you will need weapons suited to your talents. Retrieve a mace and a book of prayers from one of the weapon racks below, bring them to me, and show me that you know how to hold them properly.
ObjectivesText: Retrieve and equip a Trainee's Mace and a Trainee's Book of Prayers.
RewardText:
A fine weapon. It should suit your needs well.

Now let's put it to use.

Objectives.Text: Loot and Equip a Trainee's Mace
Loot and Equip a Trainee's Book of Prayers
